Articles.Content:
I assume everybody knows what a black box is. Spacecraft usually have something like that. The sensordata of the Columbia showed how the reëntry heat destroyed the inside of the wing and lead to the crash of the shuttle.

I would like to create something similar. I know there are several mods which allow some data to be stored (to file) but is there a mod or a combination of mods which allow me to store the data of more than one sensor to file at the same time?
